definitions.definition: A small pouch , usually made of either fur or plain or fur-trimmed leather , which is worn, suspended from a belt or chain , on the front of a kilt and used to hold various items normally carried in trouser pockets.

main_definition: A small pouch , usually made of either fur or plain or fur-trimmed leather , which is worn, suspended from a belt or chain , on the front of a kilt and used to hold various items normally carried in trouser pockets.
